General.Name: ShaoYang Victor Hydraulics Co.Ltd
General.Description: ShaoYang Victor Hydraulics Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells hydraulic components and complete sets of hydraulic systems in China. The company offers hydrostatic transmission products, plunger pumps and motors, hydraulic winch devices, and hydraulic rotary devices; valve, truck crane, metallurgical engineering, hydraulic engineering, shearing, squeezing, pressure filtering, and packing series hydraulic cylinders; metallurgical, nuclear, blast furnace tank, and hydraulic hoist hydraulic systems; and light piston pumps and motors, high-pressure small flow pumps, hydraulic valves and stack valves, cartridge valves, multi-way valves, etc. Its products are primarily used in iron and steel, metallurgy, hydraulic engineering, machine tools, machining centers, military, shipbuilding, and other industries. The company also exports its products to the United States, Canada, India, Russia, and other countries. ShaoYang Victor Hydraulics Co.,Ltd was founded in 1968 and is based in Shaoyang, China.
